snippet: Two drug-smuggling tunnels with rail systems stretching hundreds of yards across the United States-Mexico border were discovered by law enforcement officials, and a 73-year-old woman was arrested on suspicion of helping run one operation, federal...
abstract: Two drug-smuggling tunnels with rail systems across United States-Mexico border are discovered by law enforcement officials, and a 73-year-old woman is arrested on suspicion of helping run one operation.
lead_paragraph: Two drug-smuggling tunnels with rail systems stretching hundreds of yards across the United States-Mexico border were discovered by law enforcement officials, and a 73-year-old woman was arrested on suspicion of helping run one operation, federal authorities said Friday.

headline.main: California: Smuggling Tunnels Unearthed at Border
headline.print_headline: California: Smuggling Tunnels Unearthed at Border
